name: ROGGENWULF

special: Impervious: Only damaged by silver or magical sources. Howl: All who hear it DC 12 CHA or cannot act on their next turn. Silver Aversion: Takes double damage from silvered weapons. Cannot cross a threshold that has a silver object hung over it.
